name: A Knight's Commitment
effect:
Spend React: When your Warlord would be killed with a card effect, he or she is not killed. Kill this fighter.
Sir Selenoth knelt before Terak. "Mine body shall be broken 'fore thy blood be spilt."

name: Ablung's Quickmail
effect:
AC (+2)
Armor • Unique • Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Once per turn, ready this character. If this character has attacked this turn, he or she may not do so again.
"Too slow. Once more, you feel Viper's venom." - Sav'rukk

name: Alex Fortnot
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout • Riding +5
React: When Alex spends a Steed to move forward or backward one rank, move him an additional rank.
"Sir Robert is lucky to have Maxmilian as a friend. He can concentrate on the war, knowing his wife is safe."

name: Amberlyn
effect:
Elf Illusionist • House Netheryn
Order: Discard a card from your hand to give an Elf in your army +3 AC or +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: An Honor to Die
effect: Order: Until the end of the turn, this fighter has the ability: "React: When a character in this rank is targeted with an action or melee strike, this character becomes the new target."

name: Anatomical Knowledge
effect:
React: Before this character performs a melee strike roll, he or she make a Medicine check (DC 20, DC 15 if this character is an Assassin). If successful the strike inflicts an "additional wound if it hits.
"To the south are our allies, who thirst for lore in all its forms." - Baqbou

name: Andel
effect:
Elf • Necromancer • House Tansiq
React: When a character in your army is killed, Andel is +1 level for casting spells until the end of the turn.
Tapping into the decaying flesh, Andel's power grew as his companions died.

name: Angu Mournwater
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Dragon
Unique • Cult of Bascaron
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters are +1 or -1 level (your choice) for casting spells.
"The Blood Moon. The Broken Moon. Bascaron. The Mad Father Which Rebirthed Us All."

name: Anneal
effect:
Dwarf • Medicine +5
React: When Anneal removes a wound with a Medicine check, give the target a +2 ATK permanently.
"We are beset on all sides by evil, but we shall be strong."

name: Ararn
effect:
Mercenary • Druid
Spend Order: Search your deck for a Lycanthrope Form or character with the Lycanthrope trait, and put it in your hand. Discard a card.
"He shows curious insight, for one unmarked." - Yscar the Elder

name: Arc Lightning
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character within 3 ranks. The target must suceed with a magic save (DC equal to the target's AC) or suffer 2 wounds.
"What messenger, my queen? Was I supposed to receive a messenger?" - Ichaerus

name: Arterial Strike
effect:
Assassins play this as a 2nd level action.
React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. If the strike hits, the wounds are reduced to zero and this card is attached to the target. While this card is attached, this character suffers 1 wound at the end of each turn.
"Quick? No. Deadly? Yes." - Lazarus Saul

name: Ataxian
effect:
Mercenary
Ataxian may be in any Warlord's starting formation, regardless of faction. React: Once per turn, inflict a wound on a stunned character who falls forward.
"He's as fickle as the winds he calls." - Sir Robert the Vigilant

name: B'haya
effect:
Nothrog • Reaver
May only equip items with "Eyestalk" in the title. After B'haya suffers a wound, it must discard a random item with "Eyestalk" in the title. While B'haya is in the 1st rank, players may not bring 1st and 2nd level characters into play.

name: Bascarite Mark
effect:
ATK, AC and Skill bonuses from this character which affect one or more other characters are increased by +2.
"They're twisted and foul, aye, but they stick together." - Edge

name: Behemoth
effect:
Mercenary • Unique • Monster
React: Once per turn, when a character moves within 1 rank of the Behemoth, inflict 1 wound on the character.
"Let's see if it's friendly." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Benedric
effect:
Mercenary
Bendric may not attack
Order: Perform a melee strike. Benedric suffers 1 wound after the strike, which may not be prevented or reduced.
"Balian has given his soul; his brother has given his body. I wonder who received more in return." – Elmere

name: Black Blood Poison
effect: React: Play before this rogue performs a melee strike roll. If the strike roll hits, attach this card to the target. While this card is attached, at the beginning of each turn, this character suffers 2 wounds. Any adjacent cleric or character with the Medicine feat may discard this card as a Spend Order.

name: Bourdon
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, roll a die. On an odd number, move Bourdon to any rank in your army.
"Even they don't seem to know where they'll land." - Keziah

name: Bracers of Defense
effect:
AC (+5)
Shield
This wizard may not gain AC bonuses from other items.
"Thou wilt not touch me, mortal, no matter how thou mayst try." - Aenne the Tempest

name: Break Through
effect: Order: Play when this fighter is in the front rank with a Steed equipped. Spend a Steed to perform a Riding check (DC 13). If successful, perform a melee strike targeting a character within 2 ranks.

name: Calling the Fury
effect: Spend Order: Until the end of turn all characters must suceed with a fortitude save (DC 13, DC 20 if this wizard is a Shaman) after thay maneuver or suffer 1 wound.

name: Cat's Grace
effect: Spend Order: Target a character within one rank. Until the end of the turn, the target may play 1st-level rogue actions. If the target character is a rogue he or she gains +2 levels for using actions until the end of the turn.

name: Cerebrul
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
While Cerebrul is in play, stunned characters that move forward suffer one wound.
"It stands guard in the heart of Mourn. But for whom?" - Toren Yscar

name: Charismatic Influence
effect:
Good characters only. Paladins play this card without spending.
Spend Order: This fighter makes a Charisma check (DC 20). If successful, bring a lower level character into play from your hand, adjacent to the fighter.

name: Clerical Blessing
effect:
Order: All characters in this rank gain +8 skill until the end of the turn.
Kavara blesses those who embrace their emotions

name: Cloak of Flames
effect:
Armor
React: When this wizard is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike, discard a spell from your hand to give the wizard an AC bonus until the end of turn equal to twice the spell's level.

name: Cone of Cold
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound if it hits. After the ranged strike, the target and the characters adjacent to the target must each succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or be stunned.
"Invigorating." - Ice

name: Count Adrian
effect:
Deverenian • Riding +0
Order: Spend a Steed attached to Count Adrian to perform a melee strike with an ATK of +3.
"My cousin d'Ilchant sends his noble brethren to fight for the ruined order Aroch, and calls it honor. 'Tis foolishness, and nothing more."

name: Crushing Hands
effect:
Spend Order: Target any character in play. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + this wizard's skill) or be stunned.
"I prefer not to sully mine own hands." - Lord Kestrel

name: Crux
effect:
Dwarf
Crux's melee strikes inflict an additional wound while he is adjacent to two Dwarves.
Of course, some of those who fought alongside Zeal eventually came home…

name: Divine Barrier
effect:
React: After this cleric is targeted with a melee strike, perform a melee strike targeting the opposing character.
Striking a priest sometimes has its own risks.

name: Dragon's Hoard
effect:
React: After this character kills a Dragon with a melee strike or action, search your deck for any item card, show it to your opponents, and add it to your hand. This character is +5 levels for equipping items until the end of the turn.
Spend Order: Draw a card.

name: Durick Havard
effect:
Dwarf • Defend +8
React: After Durick is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike, he makes a Defend check (DC 22) if he is the only character in this rank. If the check is successful, cancel the strike.

name: Dust Devil
effect: React: Play before a character within 3 ranks makes a ranged strike roll to make the roll a critical failure. If this cleric is a Druid, the character performing the strike may not perform any more ranged strikes this turn.

name: Elees
effect:
Elf • Scout • Farstrider
If Elees is ready at the beginning of the Ready phase, he gains Marksmanship +6 until the end of turn. Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

name: Envy's Teeth
effect:
Weapon
React: Spend Envy's Teeth when wounds from a melee strike are reduced to inflict 2 wounds on the target.
"My daughter's in Baraxton. Do I have any volunteers?" - Vronish Kez

name: Fallow Sap Poison
effect: React: Play before this rogue performs a melee strike roll. If the strike roll hits, attach this card to to the target. While this card is attached, the character must succeed with a poison save (DC 12, 15 if the rogue is an Assassin) after readying or become spent. Any adjacent cleric or character with the Medicine feat may discard this card as a Spend Order.

name: Faluha
effect:
Skill +(+4) Familiar
+4 Skill
Order: Spend Faluha to look at the top card of your deck. You may return it to the top or bottom of your deck.
"Take wing, my friend, and lead us to Sav'rukk." - Dakat

name: Father Nicodemus
effect:
Deverenian • Myerdeth
Order: Once per turn give a +3 ATK to a Deverenian in this rank.
"Thou asketh of the old gods? I know nothing, of course, but if thou wilt come with me…"

name: Fields of Bone
effect:
Necromancer only.
Spend Order: All players may take characters of lower level than this wizard from their discard pile and place them into play into their 1st ranks. Players may not retrieve more than one copy of a Unique character, nor more total levels than three times the Necromancer's. Until the end of the turn, these characters have the Undead trait and are evil. At the end of the turn, discard the characters.

name: Fine Saddle
effect:
Riding +10
If this character's Steed is discarded, discard Fine Saddle.
"We've a long ride to meet d'Ilchant, Lucian. Make sure Helix is comfortable." - Terak

name: Flank
effect:
Dwarf • Traitor
While Flank is adjacent to exactly 1 character, Flank gains +3 AC and the adjacent character gains +2 AC.
"Anwar may have a new name and cause, but he is still an elf and a traitor, and shall be treated as such." - Quinthe

name: Fredrick Brunner
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Chiurgeon
Medicine +7
Order: Once per turn, target a player. That player's next order may not be an attack. You may immediately perform another Order.
"I patch them up and send them back out. Sometimes I wonder why I bother…"

name: Friction
effect:
Order: Spend a character adjacent to a character of opposite alignment.
Spend Order: Stun a spent good character adjacent to a character of opposite alignment.
"I don't care who Krun has. If he wants my support, he can match Hate's offer." - Vronish Kez

name: Furore
effect:
Dwarf
Furore amy not equip Armor or Shield Items. Furore may equip 2 Weapons.
He remembers nothing of his past, before Ter-Soth came.

name: Gharin Suul
effect:
Mercenary • Scout • Stealth +4
While Gharin is in an opposing player's formation that player must play with his or her hand face-up.

name: Giant Bat
effect:
Steed • Evil characters only.
Stealth +5
Order: Spend the Giant Bat to move forward or backward exactly two ranks.
"Graceful? Oh, yeah, they fly like an arrow — and steer like a cow." — Basil Nemis

name: Gladius
effect:
Weapon
Shields may not prevent this character from making multiple strikes in a turn.
React: Spend the Gladius when this character targets a melee strike to perform an additional melee strike after this one, against the same target. Both strikes receive a -5 ATK penalty.

name: Gloves of Grasping
effect:
Gauntlet
Spend Order: Stun this character to stun a lower level character in an adjacent rank.
Order: Discard the Gloves of Grasping to discard a non-Armor item within one rank.

name: Greaves
effect:
AC (+1)
React: Spend Greaves when an opponent's action spends this fighter to cancel the action.
"Protect yer shins, son. No one thinks about his shins till it's too late." - Sir Wallence

name: Hagerd Halfkin
effect:
Mercenary •
May start in the army of a Dwarf or Deverenian Warlord.
Hagerd gains +4 ATK when he targets a Dwarf or Deverenian with a melee strike.
"No, sire. No exile has ever survived for long on the surface." - Poison

name: Harm Touch
effect:
Evil Paladin only.
Order: Attach this card to this character if he or she does not have Harm Touch attached. While this card is attached, this character has the ability: "Order: Once per turn, target a character within one rank. That character must make a magic save (DC 13) or suffer one wound."

name: Havelin Tansiq
effect:
Elf Warlord • Unique • House Tansiq
Priest of Flesh • Magic Resistance +0
Order: If Havellin Tansiq is your Warlord, kill an Elf in your army to give an Elf in your army +1 HP permanently.
"I am not a butcher. I am a murderer. Know the difference, and know House Tansiq."

name: Healing Choir
effect:
Order: Spend any number of clerics and bards in your army. For each character spent, you may remove a wound from a character in your army.
The hymn of Athanaes spread peace throughout the city.

name: Heart of the Beast
effect:
Lycanthrope only.
React: Play when equipping a Lycanthrope Form while a different one is already equipped. Do not discard the current Form. Muscles rippled and molded into forms never found in nature.

name: Heavy Charger
effect:
Steed
+1 Hit Point
Order: Spend Heavy Charger to move forward 1 rank.
"The point, dear cousin, is to keep thy horse beneath thee." - Sir Alain D'Ilchant

name: Helm of Kor
effect:
AC (+1)
Helm
React: Spend the Helm when a character in another army readies outside of the ready phase to ready a character in your army.
Avalanche locked eyes with Zeal for an instant, then whispered his first prayer to Kor in a decade.

name: Hestior
effect:
Steed
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, this character gains an AC bonus equal to his or her Skill (plus Riding Feat, if he or she has it.)
Order: Spend Hestior to move forward one rank.

name: Hidden Motives
effect:
React: Play when an action by this rogue is being canceled. If the rogue succeeds with a Stealth check (DC 15), the action is not cancelled.
Order: This rogue gains +5 Stealth until the end of the turn.
"Gahid's armies advance his own designs, now. The Empire never ordered him to enter Myreth." - Isil Loth

name: Hobart Olafsson
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Misearis
Spend Order: Search your deck for a card with "Poison" in the title, reveal it, and add it to your hand.
"Right side - wrong side… I just want the winning side."

name: Hrunting
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian
Sav'rukk's Legion
React: After Hrunting makes a successful melee strike roll, the strike inflicts one additional wound. Inflict one wound on Hrunting.
"They try to stop Sav'rukk. I stop them."

name: Improved Invisibility
effect:
Illusionists play this as a 2nd level spell.
Spend Order: Attach this card to a character within 2 ranks. While this card is attached, the character gains Stealth +10 and may not be targeted by characters. This effect ends after the character performs a strike or action that targets another character, or the end of the next turn, whichever comes first.

name: Inspired
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character in your army. Give the character the feat of your choice at +5 until the end of the turn.
"A bard's words can fill the heart, and make you believe anything is possible." - Jack Covit

name: Inspired Leadership
effect: Spend React: When your Warlord dies and this character has the Charisma feat, this character makes a Charisma check (DC 20). If the check succeeds, you do not lose the game and this character permanently gains the Warlord trait.

name: Judas Root Poison
effect: React: Play before this rogue performs a melee strike roll. If the strike roll hits, attach this card to the target. While this card is attached, the character has -10 ATK. Any adjacent cleric or character with the Medicine feat may discard this card as a Spend Order.

name: Know Thine Enemy
effect: Order: Target an opposing Warlord. Perform a Tactics check (DC 15 plus the target's skill, DC 5 plus the target's skill if he is the same faction). If successful, the target may not use actions printed on his or her card and equipped items until the end of the turn.

name: Lay Hands
effect:
Good Paladin only.
Order: Attach this card to this character if he or she does not have Lay Hands attached. While this card is attached, this character has the ability "React: Once per turn, when another character in this rank is suffering wounds, reduce the wounds by one."
"We protect when we can, soothe when we cannot." - Sir Selenoth

name: Lord Kestrel
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Illusionist
Unique • Myredeth
Order: Once per turn, give another Deverenian in play one of the following until Kestrel uses this ability again: +5 ATK, +5 AC, +1 HP, or +5 Skill.
"Calm thyself, Bruin. I am the only devil thou needst ever fear."

name: Maddening Scream
effect:
Bards play this as if they are wizards.
Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters have -5 skill.
"You should have recited your incantations with more care, son of Deverenus." - Lord Kestrel

name: Mangonel
effect:
Nothrog • Seige • May not equip items
Spend Order: Perform 2 consecutive +0 ranged strikes that cannot receive bonuses to the roll. Stun Mangonel.
Nothrog ingenuity is a scary sight to behold.

name: Martin Treek
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout
Spend Order: All characters in the rank behind Martin gain Marksmanship +5 until the end of the turn.
"He makes our bowmen deadlier but takes no credit." - Darian Windson

name: Mason Tallow
effect:
Nothrog • Traitor
React: When Mason is suffering wounds from a melee strike or ranged strike, discard a card from your hand to reduce the wounds by one.
"Gold is gold, no matter what Kerebrus says."

name: Mass Hallucination
effect:
Illusionist only.
Spend Order: Target an army in play. While this character is spent, characters in the target army must succeed at a perception check (DC = 15) after targeting melee and ranged strikes or the strike is cancelled. The effects of this spell end immediately if the caster becomes stunned or ready. The caster may remain spent during the Ready phase.

name: Master Caremus
effect:
Deverenian • Ghenis Blademaster
Caremus is both a fighter and a rogue. Caremus enters play as if he were a 4th level character. Caremus may equip 2 Weapons. Caremus gains +2 AC for every Weapon he has equipped.

name: Mental Block
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character within 3 ranks who must succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or attach this card. While this card is attached, this wizard may perform the action: "React: Discard Mental Block to cancel an action by the character it is attached to."
Why am I chasing this guy?

name: Midnight Poison
effect:
React: Play before this rogue performs a melee strike roll. If the strike roll hits, the target must succeed with a poison save (DC 10, DC 20 if the rogue is an Assassin) or die.
"Obstacles need to be removed. When they are inanimate, you hire laborers. Otherwise, you hire me." - Hobart Olafsson

name: Might of Faith
effect: Even after the loss of the Paladins of Aroch, Albrecht's blessings strengthened his warriors.

name: Mirth
effect:
When Mirth dies, all Dwarves in your army suffer a -1 AC until the end of the turn.
"He reminds us that there is more to life than just war." - Garn Hearthstone

name: Misear Mace
effect:
Weapon
Misear Mace has an additional +1 ATK for each Druid, Shaman, Barbarian, Ranger, and Scout in your army.
"It's as subtle as I get." - Donovan Che'har

name: Mobility
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll by this rogue. The character receives +4 to the roll, and moves back one rank after the strike.
"Getting out of the way is the best defense." - Basil Nemis

name: Moon Fever
effect:
Mercenary • Lycanthrope
When Moon Fever enters play, search your deck for a Lycanthrope Form and attach it to him. React: When Moon Fever is targeted with a melee strike, the opponent must succeed with a fear save (DC 12) or the strike is canceled.

name: Mystic Visions
effect:
Druid and Shaman only.
This card is a spell.
Spend Order: Look at the top 10 cards of your deck. Draw a card.
"Trust not your left hand. Trust not your right hand. Trust not your eyes. Betrayal is all around you." - Toren Yscar

name: N'totk
effect:
Dwarf • Traitor
N'totk inflicts an additional wound on melee strikes against Nothrogs.
"Uthanak may preach strength, but these dwarves know what strength truly is"

name: Nanji
effect:
Elf
Order: Discard a Weapon attached to Nanji to perform a +5 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.
"I may not love Lord Netheryn, but he at least will not exterminate the humans. Without them, we die."

name: Nina Worth
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
Spend React: After an opposing characters succeeds with a magic save, the character must reroll.
"She hangs about him like a shameless harlot." - Aenne the Tempest

name: Nothrog Daggers
effect:
Weapon
This character gains +3 ATK and inflicts an additional wound when targeting a higher-level character with a melee strike.
Sav'rukk smiled to himself as he watched the band of Nothrog scour the woods. "Perhaps this time I will let them find me before they die."

name: One In a Million
effect:
Ranger or Scout only
React: Before this character targets a ranged strike, he or she makes a Marksmanship check (DC 30). If successful, this strike may target any character in play, regardless of ranks.
"Great shot kid!" - Davon Ironthorn

name: Patchwork Armor
effect:
AC (+2)
Armor • Defend +8
There is no limit to the number of copies of Patchwork Armor you may have in your deck. Characters higher than 2nd level may not equip Patchwork Armor.
"You've got to be kidding me." - Forge

name: Perfect Aim
effect:
Ranger or Scout only.
React: Play before this character performs a ranged strike roll, to play one react as if this character were about to make a melee strike roll against the ranged strike's target. All ATK bonuses from the react become bonuses to the die roll.

name: Pinned Down
effect:
React: Play after this character performs a ranged strike to perform a Marksmanship roll. The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC equal to the Marksmanship roll) or be spent.
"The Misearean arrows held the refugees down long enough for the Nothrog to reach them." - Logan Ebonwolfe

name: Pipes of Haunting
effect:
Bard only.
Spend Order: Target a character within 2 ranks. The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 15) or you may do any one of the following: 1) Spend the target; 2) Have the target perform a melee strike against any character within 1 rank; 3) Move the target forward or backward one rank.

name: Pol Deslines
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Defend +5
Spend React: When Pol Deslines uses his Defend feat, he gains +5 AC until the end of the strike.
He left Merrick to help other lands avoid its fate…

name: Power Word: Blind
effect:
React: When this character is targeted with a melee attack, the opponent must make a magic save (DC 17) or attach this card. While this card is attached, this character suffers -10 ATK.
The last thing he saw was the scaled monster with the evil grin…

name: Quick Shielding
effect:
React: After a character within 2 ranks is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, increase the target's AC by this cleric's level until the end of the turn.
Ruth whispered a prayer to Ishara. Her quest for allies had come too far to die to a single Nothrog.

name: Quick Strength
effect: Atu stared at the oncoming troops, his silence as threatening as any battle cry.

name: Quite a Speech!
effect: React: If this character has Charisma and a character in your army fails a roll (including a critical failure), make a Charisma check (DC 15). If successful, the other character may reroll.

name: Racine Pendrak
effect:
Mercenary • Scout
Marksmanship +5 • Exile
Spend Order: Search your deck for a Bow and equip it to Racine.
"Your crime is forgiven, but Toris Kelt may no longer be your home." - Captain Dukat

name: Ram'zar
effect:
Nothrog • Sav'rukk's Legion
Order: Once per turn, gain +5 ATK until the end of the turn.
Order: Once per turn, until the end of the turn, melee strikes by Ram'zar inflict an additional wound.

name: Ramah the Cruel
effect:
Deverenian • Traitor
Order: Once per turn, kill another character in your army to draw a card. Ramah may immediately cast a spell Order (or Spend Order) that he is capable of casting.
"Slayer's greatest student - the only man to betray him and live - mine." - Azhraan the Foul

name: Razel
effect:
Familiar
Scribe +0
Order: Spend Razel and discard a wizard spell to draw a card.
"Many secrets are observed by eyes borne upon soft paws." - Master Isil Loth

name: Reckless Assault
effect:
May only be played by characters in an opposing formation.
Order: Perform a melee strike.
"Have you ever noticed how their armor is heaviest on the front?"

name: Redeemer
effect:
Weapon
When this fighter hits a character of the same faction with a melee strike, he or she inflicts 2 additional wounds.
"Soren is the greatest traitor the dwarves have ever known. Thank Kor we have Zeal to aid us against him." - King Xod

name: Resuscitation
effect:
Spend Order: If this character has the Medicine feat, target a character in your discard pile who was killed this turn. This character performs a Medicine check (DC 25). If successful, place the target into your hand.
"On your feet whelp — die on your own time!" - Rac Ironbone

name: Reversal of Fortune
effect:
React: Play when this character rolls a '1' on a die roll (unadjusted by card effects). Change the result to a '20'.
"And what do you want in return, Sir Rhawn?" - Terak Justicebringer

name: Riding Low
effect: React: Play after this character is hit with a melee or ranged strike roll. This character makes a Riding check (DC 10 for ranged strike, DC 15 for melee strike). If successful, discard a Steed attached to this character to prevent all wounds from the strike.

name: Rr'gent
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Traitor
If Rr'gent is in play during the end phase, your hand size is reduced by one.
While Rr'gent is in play, players may not use card effects to draw cards.
"They fight for freedom. I ask you, does Sav'rukk do any less?"

name: Rubble
effect:
Dwarf
Rubble's ranged strike rolls receive +1 for each Elemental and Gargoyle in your army. Rubble may cast 'Gargoyle only' spells as if he were a level 5 cleric.
"The seers placed him with the wizards, yet I do not believe that was his true calling." - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Sacred Texts
effect:
Spells cast by this cleric may not be cancelled.
"There's much to be learned at the library of Athanaes, but remember to eat and sleep as well."

name: Sav'rukk
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Scout • Unique
If Sav'rukk is your Warlord, all Nothrogs in this army have the ability: "Spend React: When this character is targeted with a melee strike or action, move forward or backward one rank to cancel it."

name: Scorch
effect:
Dwarf • Stealth +5 • Saboteur
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on a Siege character in this rank. This is a Stealth action.
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on all Siege characters in this rank.

name: Shadow Walking
effect:
Illusionists play this as a 3rd level spell.
Spend Order: Give a character in your army the Astral or Ethereal trait until the end of the turn.
"I can still access the other realms. Be thankful of that." - Lord Kestrel

name: Shield of the Storm
effect:
AC (+1)
Shield
React: When a character in your army dies, kill this cleric to put that character into your hand.
"Lord Kestrel is truly the best of us. For him would I gladly lay down my life." - Baron Delvin

name: Shraan
effect:
Mercenary • Fire Elemental
You must have a level 4 or higher wizard in your army to bring Shraan into play.
React: After a melee strike targets this character, the attacker suffers one wound.
"He creates nothing, and destroys all he touches." - Cael Ben-Jinn

name: Siege Engine Crew
effect:
Nothrog • Hellbringer's Legion
Spend Order: Move a Siege character in your army forward or backward one rank.
"Position your troops where you may, you will still not catch me." - Sav'rukk

name: Sileth Elestra
effect:
Elf • Undead • Priest of Flesh
Spend Order: Your Undead characters have +1 Hit Point until the end of the turn.
"His ghouls may be strong, but like a simple club, they are crude." - Morghen Dythanus

name: Sir Galvedir
effect:
Deverenian • Riding +5 • Stealth +3
Order: Until the end of the turn, Sir Galvedir does not count towards illegal ranks while he has a Steed equipped.
"e'en a Denskan can earn his place in an Order, though he's naught but a fool to try." - Ygraine

name: Sir Kwell D'Ilchant
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin
Grey Rider • Traitor
When Kwell is killed by an opposing character, select one Free Kingdoms character of equal or lower level than Kwell in your army. Until the end of turn, wounds suffered by that character are reduced to zero.

name: Sir Selenoth
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin • Aedroud • Grey Rider
Sir Selenoth may cast 1st level cleric spells.
Spend Order: Remove a wound from an adjacent Free Kingdoms character.
"My two finest trainers. They shall follow thy every command, until I come to claim them." - Sir Rhawn

name: Skin Like Steel
effect:
React: When this character is hit by a melee strike, make a Defend check (DC 20). If successful, reduce the wounds to 0.
"That was your free shot. Now it's my turn."

name: Solidarity
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn players may not bring characters into play that are a different faction or alignment from their Warlord.
"Logan's gone. You can either go off after him or join me. Be quick about it though - we have a city to save." - Adarymy

name: Soren Nehil
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Paladin • Unique
Soren can cast 1st and 2nd level cleric spells. Dwarves in Soren's army are evil.
React: When a wound is removed from Soren, he gains +2 ATK permanently.
"You are Zeal no more." – Ter Soth

name: Sphere of Silence
effect:
Illusionist only.
Spend Order: Attach this card to a character in play. While this card is attached that character gains Stealth+5 but may not cast spells or use actions restricted to Bards. While this card is attached, the character may perform the action: "Order: Once per turn, perform a magic save (DC 15). If successful, discard Sphere of Silence."

name: Spring Up
effect:
React: When a character readies outside of the readying phase, perform a melee strike against that character.
"Surprise is as much a weapon as any blade." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Squire Arrigan
effect:
Squire Arrigan inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against characters without Armor or a Shi8eld equipped.
"I have seen her fight, and she lets neither flesh nor bone stand in her way." - Strongarm

name: Squire Orban
effect:
Mercenary
Orban has +3 ATK and +2 AC when the Warlord of his army is a good fighter.
React: If your Warlord is a good fighter and adjacent to Orban, redirect a melee strike or action targeting your Warlord to Orban.
"Disillusioned, he searcheth for new illusions." - Alhana Genecourt

name: Staff of Power
effect:
Weapon - Characters in your army adjacent to this wizard have -1 Hit Point.
React: Once per turn, this wizard may ignore the class requirement of an action card.
"Knowledge that powerful doth cost dearly. Ne'er the less, I shall pay." - Azhraan the Foul

name: Stephen Blake
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Stephen inflicts an additional wound when performing a melee strike against a spent characters.
"Mercy is a luxury we cannot afford."

name: Superior Reach
effect:
React: Play when this fighter is targeted with a melee strike. If this fighter has a Weapon equipped that is also a Shield, perform a melee strike targeting the attacker.
"Dost thou wish to kill me? Come closer... "

name: T'kilth
effect:
Elf • Medicine +3
Traitor • House Tansiq
Spend Order: Target a character within 1 rank and perform a Medicine check (DC 20). If successful, inflict a wound on the target.

name: Tales of Courage
effect:
Bard only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, characters in your army gain +5 to all saves.
Order: Give a character within 1 rank Powerattack +3.
"Sir Robert fights for our city. Friends, do not leave him now." - Fauve Mightyheart

name: Tarvil
effect:
Nothrog • Ranger • Traitor
Spend Order: The next time an opposing character moves within 1 rank of Tarvil, perform a melee strike targeting that character with a +5 to the die roll.

name: Terrorshaard
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Unique • May not equip items
Terrorshaard inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike
Spend Order: Destroy an item up to 2 ranks away.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Thallen
effect:
Deverenian
Thallen is the same class as your Warlord.
"The orders will not have him, so young Thallen searches for a master, ready to learn whatever he can." - Squire Edonloc

name: The Favor of Fools
effect:
React: After this rogue rolls a die, re-roll it if there is a cleric of the same alignment and faction within one rank.
Jonah awoke with a choking cough. "Welcome back," said Baqbou.

name: The Iron Duke
effect:
Deverenian • Traitor
The Iron Duke inflicts an additional wound on higher level characters when he inflicts wounds with a melee strike.
"Tell me more, my dwarven friend, and I shall grant thee more than a mere title." - Lady Gracia Ghenis

name: The Martyr's Blade
effect:
Weapon • Unique • Good only • Defend +5
Melee strikes performed by this character ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits.
React: When this character hits an Undead or Abyssal character with a melee strike, stun this character to inflict 2 additional wounds on the target.

name: The Wind At Your Back
effect:
Shaman only. This action may be performed by a stunned character.
Order: Ready this Shaman.
"The Tansiq draw their power where they may, even if it means killing other elves."

name: Thekem
effect:
Elf • House Netheryn
React: Once per turn, after Thekem spends to cast a spell, ready him.
"Well done, my young apprentice." - Ichaerus smiled coldly.

name: Thievesbane
effect:
Unique • Cursed
While Thievesbane is equipped, rogue actions that may target this character must do so, and actions that may discard this item must do so.
"Oh, you fell for it too?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Thunderstrike
effect:
Weapon
React: After this fighter hits a character with a melee strike, the target and unspent adjacent characters must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 12) or be spent.

name: Tough as Nails
effect:
Barbarians play this without spending.
Spend React: Play when this character is hit with a melee strike from a character without a Weapon equipped. Reduce all wounds from this strike to zero.
"Come back when you're old enough to drink... " - Uther, Killer of Bears

name: Trogid
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
React: When Trogid dies, move a Monster in your army forward or backward one rank.
"My blood for the spawn of the Blood Moon!"

name: Try Again, I Dare You
effect: React: Play before this character makes a melee strike roll as a result of a Riposte check. If the strike hits, it inflicts an additional wound and you may discard one item equipped by the target (before wounds are inflicted).

name: Varin
effect:
Nothrog • Hellbringer's Legion
Spend Order: Discard a card to ready an adjacent non-stunned Siege character.
Spend React: Before an adjacent Siege character makes a die roll, add +3 to the die roll.

name: Vital Distraction
effect:
React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee strike, the rogue gains "Riposte +5" until the end of the turn.
"While Robert fights the bull, he doesn't notice the viper." - Vronish Kez

name: Vivian
effect:
Elf • Ranger • Farstrider • Marksmanship +5
Order: Up to twice per turn, perform a +1 ranged strike.
As she drew the arrow back, she wondered if she dared fire on another elf.

name: Vronish Kez
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Unique • Misearis
Vronish Kez gains +2 ATK, +2 AC, and +2 skill for each faction other than Free Kingdoms in his army.
React: Once per turn, ignore the loyalty penalty when brining an evil character into play.
"Fools."

name: Wave of Pain
effect:
Spend Order: All non-Undead and non-Siege characters in play must make a Fortitude save (DC 10) or become spent. Stunned characters are unaffected.
"Ichaerus shall bow before me yet!" - Tepheroth.

name: Well Supplied
effect: Spend Order: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. You may equip any revealed items to characters in your army who may legally equip them, but no more than 1 item per character. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.

name: Whirlwind Boots
effect:
AC (+1)
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike, targeting a character 2 ranks away.
"Since when have you let distance get in your way?" - Sav'rukk

name: Woodlands Cloak
effect:
AC (+1)
Armor • Stealth +0
Rangers may equip this as a fighter item.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. This is a Stealth action.

name: Words of Hope
effect:
Order: Target a Stunned character within two ranks. This character makes a Charisma check (DC 14). If successful, the target becomes spent.
The dwarves gathered close to listen to Zeal.

name: Wroth
effect:
Nothrog • Defend +7 • Traitor
React: Once per turn, when a Nothrog adjacent to Wroth is targeted with a strike, move that Nothrog backward one rank to retarget the strike to Wroth.
"It's nice to be on the winning side."

name: Zachary Blaise
effect:
Elf • Scout • Traitor
If Zachary is the only character in this rank, he is killed.
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on a good character in an adjacent rank.
"He betrayed his family and his lands. Now the only thing he has to lose is his life." - Sir Wallence
